text: At 4-6 weeks of age, mice were infected by intracranial injection of 2 × 10 5 PFU of the Daniel's strain of TMEV in 10 μL DMEM, prepared as previously described [20] . Sham-infected mice received intracranial injection of 10 μL virus-free DMEM (Cellgro; Herndon, VA). In some experiments, virus was inactivated by exposure to short-wavelength UVc light (254 nm) for 15 min at room temperature immediately prior to inoculation.
